website_summaries.verdict: Beautiful and practical, this cast iron braiser is your top of the line choice.
pros: Beautiful enough to transition easily from oven to table
Can be used on all types of stove tops or ovens
Can also be used as a skillet
The company makes this braiser in its own foundry in France
cons: Since this is cast iron, it is a heavy pot to use

customer_reviews.title: Large enough and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: 5 qt! It’s HUGE and beautiful. inner diameter is 32~33 cm (13 inch). Lid has a number of 32. Maybe represents 32 cm diameter. My family love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kunappe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I went back and forth about what size to get. Went to some stores but no one had the 5qt on display to get a feel of how big it really was. So glad we went bigger. Even though it’s just the two of us, it’s nice to make something and have leftovers. The finish is beautiful as well. We saved up for this and have not been disappointed at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Kruljac

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Wife said it’s one of those products you didn’t know you needed until after you start using it. Doesn’t burn on, easy to clean. Solid quality. I haven’t been able to use it myself yet, wife won’t let me :)
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Well made and worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this pan! I have wanted one for years and finally got the guts to spend so much on one pan, I can tell you it was well worth every penny. The pan is extremely heavy but large enough to cook for our large family in one pan. I clean it and leave it on the stove as a decorative touch in our kitchen. It cooks everything evenly and is easy to clean. If anything sticks I put a layer of white vinegar and a couple pumps of dish soap and let it soak 5-10 min and everything comes cleanly out of the pan with no effort.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Jeffords

customer_reviews.title: middle gets hotter
customer_reviews.text: I love le creuset products but I'm confused about this one. I use induction, maybe that's the problem. I've used this pan about 4 times now. It seems to be higher in the middle so that the oil or butter I use go to the side and it makes food in the middle burn more easily. I don't know how to clean the middle part either so now I bought their official cleaning product to see if that would help to clean it. All in all not my favorite pan and certainly not worth its money.
customer_reviews.author: Leendert

customer_reviews.title: Used Almost Everyday
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted a large braiser, for company, but we now pull it out often. It holds heat well, it is spacious, allowing for fewer spills over the side, yet not deep like a saucepan. The enamel finish is naturally more difficult to clean that the Scan Pan type, but a little baking soda makes it not a chore.
customer_reviews.author: L'Etranger

customer_reviews.title: Best cooking purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: When I was considering this pan, I read a review that said this was the best pan/cooking item the person had ever purchased. I doubted that, but indeed, now that I have it - it is true for me as well. This is a big expense, but if I had purchased this earlier I could have saved myself the cost of many pots and pans I didn't need. I have already used it so much - almost every day. So far it is like new and cooks so well. I will follow up in a few months to indicate how it reacts to wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: DLittle

customer_reviews.title: Flawed finish
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with flaws on top of lid and on side of brasier pan. Returned it
customer_reviews.author: llindalu

customer_reviews.title: Is it supposed to look like this?
customer_reviews.text: For how much this thing cost, I expected better quality. The paint job on this thing is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Creypaper

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a used option, note was damage to box only, this is an amazing item. So worth the money and truly, only the box was damaged. Best purchase I ever made on Amazon. The 15.5 inch base size is perfect for so many of my cooking recipes. Absolutely 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The pan is beautiful and will last a life time. Still not sure it is worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Worth every penny, easy to clean and beautiful color
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Braiser
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan..cooking at it finest..so glad i got the large one,perfect for family meals..cleans up easy.works great on my gas stovetop..worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the best piece ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love the wide surface to sauté or to make a simple pasta sauce and toss your pasta in it. You can serve your food right from this pan because it's so beautiful! My favorite pot by far. And Le Creuset is so so worth every penny, your food comes out better and so easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Taleen M Keshishian

customer_reviews.title: Poor paint job on lid
customer_reviews.text: I have many different products from Le Creuset and I was excited when this arrived in the mail today. The color is beautiful and everything looked great during the unboxing, until I noticed the poor paint job on the ‘Le Creuset’ lettering on the lid (picture two). I expected better. Never used, will be returning. Hesitant to purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: James J Burns

customer_reviews.title: Best in kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: Since buying this, it has become the default cooking dish in our house. We use it multiple times per week- covered, uncovered, range, oven. I could probably toss almost every other pot and pan we own.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Fry and Clean
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for all my frying needs, it's easy to clean and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Best cookware to have
customer_reviews.text: I Just love Lecruset Braising pot I will soon get the 7 quart Dutch ovens
customer_reviews.author: katia

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Great pot, not difficult to clean. We find ourselves using this a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality! Will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.text: This truly is a Quality made product. Very sleek design and heavy lid to ensure moisture stays inside the roaster. Very large design to ensure good searing and prevents overcrowding of the pan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This way it re-heated wonderfully, even though I didn't make the carrot ring ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a huge skillet that I cannot live without. This is even though it is only my husband and myself. It is worth every penny. When cooking heat your pan a little *first,* then add oil. This creates the non-stick barrier. It sure made a hit at the potluck when I put a carrot ring with peas inside. This way it re-heated wonderfully, even though I didn't make the carrot ring in it (of course hahaha). If you can, take the bigger one over the smaller one. Although, I intend to get the smaller one too. Le Creuset is where it is at for quality when it comes to porcelain-clad cast iron.
customer_reviews.author: snowy

customer_reviews.title: Why Did I Wait So Long To Buy This?
customer_reviews.text: I use this almost every day. It replaced a knockoff skillet and a small Dutch oven, also a knockoff. There is absolutely no substitute for the real thing. I could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: patty

customer_reviews.title: An Excellant Product
customer_reviews.text: This is now one of my regular "go to" cooking implements. I am braising food more and more, and the results are fantastic. It is rather heavy, however, and requires some muscle to transport it from the cooking range to the oven and back.
customer_reviews.author: William Van Nostrand

customer_reviews.title: Excellent condition
customer_reviews.text: I knew when I purchased that the item had been opened but was in excellent to good condition. It was in perfect condition. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia S.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Pan
customer_reviews.text: I have several Le Creuset pans that I have gathered over the years. I love them all. This pan is so versatile I use it constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma63

customer_reviews.title: The Best Size
customer_reviews.text: Best cooking pan ever! Use all the time! Good for oven low temp cooking and stove top cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth B.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: Believe the hype. This brand of pans is totally worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Stalcup

customer_reviews.title: Great for French cooking
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, essential for French cooking and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: MGTR

customer_reviews.title: bad but the Le Creuset is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I already own a braiser I purchased from Aldi foods a few years back and wondered how much different this one would be. They don't even belong in the same class. Not that the cheap version $34.99 was, bad but the Le Creuset is amazing. Even heat distribution throughout, making for a better brown on food surfaces. Evenly coated enamel with no random bumps on the surface. Which by the way eventually wear through to expose cast. Larger handles for moving in and out of the oven. This is my first piece of Le Creuset and I am very sure I will purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: Taparue

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, cooks even better! Cleans up very well to boot!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love my newest pot. Le Creuset is the best, and this is my new go-to pot. The color is really fresh and pretty, too!
customer_reviews.author: ReadingAllTheTime

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift for my wife.  Home run!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife for Christmas. She absolutely loves it. She's used it several times and is very pleased Witt how even it heats up and cooks. She has a matching 3 quart stock pot, so we were familiar with La Creuset. Spendy, but top of the line!
customer_reviews.author: Brian G

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: I am going to school for my culinary degree and I use this braiser for so much more than just braising, a must have for the kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Cody Wood

customer_reviews.title: Quality above all
customer_reviews.text: Although one can successfully braise using a French oven (a haute cocotte), for certain dishes a lower pot (a basse cocotte) is preferable if one wishes drier steam as opposed to wetter steam. The Le Creuset braisers perform as is to be expected from a producer of top quality cookware. I recommend the product without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Antonio Arce Arenales

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, good price, LOVE the color!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I was so excited to find this color at this price that I ordered it right away. I was just CRUSHED however when it showed up. In my excitement I neglected to read the part about this being a 5 qt BRAISER not the 5 qt DUTCH OVEN I had been saving my money for. Totally my fault. I kept it any way and I really love how it feels to cook in. I can brown and slow cook in it and the tagine style dishes turn out fantastic and look really festive served in the same dish. One less dish to wash and it keep the food warm for seconds!
customer_reviews.author: michele

customer_reviews.title: This is a le creuset seconds seller (like the kind ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a le creuset seconds seller (like the kind you buy at an outlet mall) you can tell because the lid doesn't fit tight, its loose! Le creuset sends the junk there and they sell it half off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It cooks so well and easy clean up
customer_reviews.text: I live it. It cooks so well and easy clean up. Meant to press 5 star
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color. Had to buy the knob (size large for 5qt) in order to use in the oven. The color is like an ombre. I haven't used it yet but 5qt seems to be a good size for meal prepping meats for the work week for 1 person. Looks huge on the stove. I know some have mentioned it might not be a legit Le Creuset but this is sold by Amazon, so I trust it. And lastly, I picked the Caribbean color which is more torquise in person than what my camera captured
customer_reviews.author: Wying

customer_reviews.title: An investment worth making!
customer_reviews.text: This is truly an investment worth making - for your health (no toxins leaching into your food), for the taste of your food, and really for the pleasure of cooking with. Everything I have made in my enameled Le Creuset has turned out amazing! Plus it gives me such peace of mind to use non-toxic cookware. Do your research - all of those "wonderful non-stick" pans are convenient and cheap, but they are some of the greatest endocrine disruptors of our time. It's pricey, yes. But your health is priceless. And your food will never taste better! Plus, this is one of those items that can last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Braiser
customer_reviews.text: I love Le Creuset. I have three pieces and use them all the time. They are well made and come with a great guarantee. I had one piece for more than 40 years and when a piece of the enamel came off it was replace without question. Just cost me the shipping. Take good care of them and they will last your lifetime and will become a family heirloom. This particular piece is great of braising meats, cooking large quantities of root vegetables. If I could afford it I would replace all my cookware with Le Creuset.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Not new! Received a used product. Not happy.
customer_reviews.text: This is very expensive and I ordered it as a gift for my husband's 40th birthday. The Le Creuset box was opened, damaged (not by shipping), and then retaped. It was very obviously not new. It looked awful and I would be embarrassed to give this to anyone as a gift. I will be returning it and buying one from Bed Bath and Beyond that at least I'll know is brand new and comes in an unopened, undamaged box. Very frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: A. Fanning

customer_reviews.title: Use it several times a week!
customer_reviews.text: I already had a Le Creuset 5 quart dutch oven but wanted something that I could sear meat and spread out a bit more. This thing is awesome! It cooks so evenly. Expensive, but the quality is like no other. I will have my Le Creuset items forever. It's heavy, but heavy duty. I've used it for cooking up a couple chicken breasts, and for a big meal with like 6 chicken breasts. Cleans up easy too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No stickiness or stains
customer_reviews.text: I used this Braiser as soon as I got it. Immediately I used to make fettuccine Alfredo next day pot roast. I seared the pot roast in it then stuck in the oven for 3 hours. Both times everything washed off like magic. I was skeptical at first. My first time owning a Le Creuset. Well everything that is said about them is true. Everything cooks wonderful and no stickiness or elbow grease. Im
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: It’ll last forever
customer_reviews.text: Great braiser! Nice tight lid when you need that. The Le Creuset brand speaks for the quality. Washes up easily. Even small meals are cooked beautifully in this pot because of the tight lid.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: Love! Love! Love!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Le Creuset pan. Everything you read is true. These pans are amazing. I have so much fun cooking with them. Yes, I wish they were cheaper, but no regrets. Dishes I have been making for years come out tasting better in these. I have had several times of wondering if they would come clean after. They always do. All I have had to do is let them soak with water for a little bit. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: I never ask questions

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It's so beautifully made, how could you not love it. Easy to clean, heats perfectly evenly, it's a fantastic braiser.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Cast iron at it’s finest. Even heating
customer_reviews.text: What can I say other then it’s Le Creuset, which translates to PERFECTION! Cast iron at it’s finest. Even heating. Easiest cleanup (even when you messed up and think you ruined the pan). And beautiful. So much fun to cook and serve in this cookware.
customer_reviews.author: Hope to Help

customer_reviews.title: Great for braising
customer_reviews.text: If you don't have this you need it. Get the bigger one, you will use it more than you think. Great for braising. Again, get the bigger one.
customer_reviews.author: Monch

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Le Creuset makes the best products. My wife was always crazy about them but I always thought they were overpriced. They have a lifetime warranty and are amazing to cook with. Take straight from stovetop to oven. They are very durable and insanely easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: The price is ridiculous and you can get a comparable product for much less.
customer_reviews.author: Beth D

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful braiser
customer_reviews.text: I bought the cherry color Le Creuset braiser. It is very pretty and can be brought straight from the stove to the table. I use it for sauteing vegetables since it is wider rather than deeper. It is perfect for my needs and I bought it at a much lower price on Amazon compared to a store plus I didn't have to carry it home as it was delivered right at my doorstep! Love Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: sp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product - mine came in Flame orange so it was returned.
customer_reviews.author: Vienes

customer_reviews.title: So versatile!
customer_reviews.text: Great piece for a wide variety of dishes. Sadly, Palm has now been discontinued so I'm so glad I grabbed this before the color was sold out. I also swapped out the included black knob for the gold version sold separately and the combo is stunning!
customer_reviews.author: KindleGirl

customer_reviews.title: Will last forever.
customer_reviews.text: Just fabulous. Color a bit different then pictured. But that’s the net.
customer_reviews.author: JeffnEcuador

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for my son. Delivery was timely and it was exactly as advertise. I could not have been more pleased with this purchase. My son was totally surprised and his first dish was braised short ribs and he said they were delicious!
customer_reviews.author: AnnieB

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful piece that will go from stove/oven to table
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece of cookware given as a gift. They collect Le Creuset and loved this piece.
customer_reviews.author: CaseyF

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: There products are pricey but I love love love both pieces I own. Great to cook with and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren M. Franciosi

customer_reviews.title: A piece of Art
customer_reviews.text: It makes cooking a pleasure . It is heavy and beautiful. I love how I can go from braising then into the oven. It is also a fine looking piece that can go right on the dining table. It also cleans right up It makes me want to cook more
customer_reviews.author: StevieBoy on the Kindle

customer_reviews.title: Best pan I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: Best dish ever. Not sure how I lived without it before. I had a 3 quart sauté pan for years that was constantly underwhelming with the small size. This is wonderful. Sauté pan and Dutch oven in one.
customer_reviews.author: Swissie Mom

customer_reviews.title: NOT disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted Le Creuset cookware and finally took the plunge and purchased a couple of pieces from Amazon. This particular item looks great and works very well. Very happy with this purchase and well worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: David Owen

customer_reviews.title: Great pot
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic large pot suitable for many purposes. Cleans easily and is very durable with appropriate care.
customer_reviews.author: JMM

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I'm not the cook but my fiance loves this. We much prefer it to our stainless cookware. And it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: Best. Cookware. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this braiser. I use it daily. Perfectly nonstick, even heat - makes me look like a better cook than I actually am.
customer_reviews.author: Professor Mom

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Le Creuset for over 30 years.This braiser has brought a new life to my cooking .I'm having fun with new cooking experiences. The braiser is so handsome that I've been keeping it on my stove.
customer_reviews.author: Anne W Shaw

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: This pan gets used nearly every day. Such a favorite that it is hardly ever put away, and a nice big size.
customer_reviews.author: Lesa K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this braising pan! The size is perfect and the color is so pretty!
customer_reviews.author: PFritz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cookware. This is my first LE Creuset piece. Cant say enough good things about it!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Hurst

customer_reviews.title: Happy wife, happy life!
customer_reviews.text: My fiance loves her new cast iron pot. I can't say the food is any better just because it was pretty good before. She happy though and that's all that matters to me!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Boyer

customer_reviews.title: love this wonderful cookware
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this purchase! The size of it is ideal! The color is amazing! I'm sure that I will keep it with me forever!
customer_reviews.author: silvana pereira coutinho

customer_reviews.title: Great brand,  Cuisinart
customer_reviews.text: A xmas gift added to my grandsons collection. He loves everyone of this brand purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Le Creuset Signature Enameled Cast-Iron Round Round Braiser, 5-Quart, Marine
product_meta.description: Color:MarineWith the signature collection braiser, the cook employs both wet and dry heats to break down tough cuts of meat and tenderize fresh vegetables. The pan's flat base allows for more than braising, including techniques like poaching, searing, roasting, stir-frying and browning. The signature collection braiser also features a low profile that makes it a convenient serving solution for crowded tables and buffet-style settings. From rich risottos and spicy curry to Jasmine rice for stir-fry, every Le creuset braiser is well-suited for preparing a wide range of main courses and side dishes that require careful moisture control.
feature_bullets: 45% larger handles that provide a sure grip, even with oven mitts
The superior heat distribution and retention of Le creuset enameled cast iron
An advanced sand-colored interior enamel with even more resistance to wear
A larger composite knob that withstands temperatures up to 500F
Colorful, long-lasting exterior enamel that resists chipping and cracking

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars148 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
